verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they turn <WH7725> and encamp <WH2583> before <WH6440> Pihahiroth <WH6367>, between Migdol <WH4024> and the sea <WH3220>, over against <WH6440> Baalzephon <WH1189>: before <WH5226> it shall ye encamp <WH2583> by the sea <WH3220>.
For Pharaoh <WH6547> will say <WH559> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, They are entangled <WH943> in the land <WH776>, the wilderness <WH4057> hath shut them in <WH5462>.

And I will harden <WH2388> Pharaoh's <WH6547> heart <WH3820>, that he shall follow <WH7291> after <WH310> them; and I will be honoured <WH3513> upon Pharaoh <WH6547>, and upon all his host <WH2428>; that the Egyptians <WH4714> may know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068>. And they did <WH6213> so.

And it was told <WH5046> the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> that the people <WH5971> fled <WH1272>: and the heart <WH3824> of Pharaoh <WH6547> and of his servants <WH5650> was turned <WH2015> against the people <WH5971>, and they said <WH559>, Why have we done <WH6213> this, that we have let Israel <WH3478> go <WH7971> from serving <WH5647> us?
And he made ready <WH631> his chariot <WH7393>, and took <WH3947> his people <WH5971> with him:
And he took <WH3947> six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> chosen <WH977> chariots <WH7393>, and all the chariots <WH7393> of Egypt <WH4714>, and captains <WH7991> over every one of them.

And the LORD <WH3068> hardened <WH2388> the heart <WH3820> of Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and he pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went out <WH3318> with an high <WH7311> hand <WH3027>.

But the Egyptians <WH4714> pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> them, all the horses <WH5483> and chariots <WH7393> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and his horsemen <WH6571>, and his army <WH2428>, and overtook <WH5381> them encamping <WH2583> by the sea <WH3220>, beside Pihahiroth <WH6367>, before <WH6440> Baalzephon <WH1189>.

And when Pharaoh <WH6547> drew nigh <WH7126>, the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> lifted up <WH5375> their eyes <WH5869>, and, behold, the Egyptians <WH4714> marched <WH5265> after <WH310> them; and they were sore <WH3966> afraid <WH3372>: and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cried out <WH6817> unto the LORD <WH3068>.

And they said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Because there were no graves <WH6913> in Egypt <WH4714>, hast thou taken us away <WH3947> to die <WH4191> in the wilderness <WH4057>? wherefore <WH2063> hast thou dealt <WH6213> thus with us, to carry us forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714>?

Is not this the word <WH1697> that we did tell <WH1696> thee in Egypt <WH4714>, saying <WH559>, Let us alone <WH2308>, that we may serve <WH5647> the Egyptians <WH4714>? For it had been better <WH2896> for us to serve <WH5647> the Egyptians <WH4714>, than that we should die <WH4191> in the wilderness <WH4057>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Fear <WH3372> ye not, stand still <WH3320>, and see <WH7200> the salvation <WH3444> of the LORD <WH3068>, which he will shew <WH6213> to you to day <WH3117>: for the Egyptians <WH4714> whom ye have seen <WH7200> to day <WH3117>, ye shall see <WH7200> them again <WH3254> no more for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>. for the: or, for whereas ye have seen the Egyptians to day
The LORD <WH3068> shall fight <WH3898> for you, and ye shall hold your peace <WH2790>.
And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Wherefore criest <WH6817> thou unto me? speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they go forward <WH5265>:

But lift thou up <WH7311> thy rod <WH4294>, and stretch out <WH5186> thine hand <WH3027> over the sea <WH3220>, and divide <WH1234> it: and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall go <WH935> on dry <WH3004> ground through the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220>.

And I, behold, I will harden <WH2388> the hearts <WH3820> of the Egyptians <WH4714>, and they shall follow <WH935> them <WH310>: and I will get me honour <WH3513> upon Pharaoh <WH6547>, and upon all his host <WH2428>, upon his chariots <WH7393>, and upon his horsemen <WH6571>.
And the Egyptians <WH4714> shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068>, when I have gotten me honour <WH3513> upon Pharaoh <WH6547>, upon his chariots <WH7393>, and upon his horsemen <WH6571>.

And the angel <WH4397> of God <WH430>, which went <WH1980> before <WH6440> the camp <WH4264> of Israel <WH3478>, removed <WH5265> and went <WH3212> behind <WH310> them; and the pillar <WH5982> of the cloud <WH6051> went <WH5265> from before their face <WH6440>, and stood <WH5975> behind <WH310> them:

And it came <WH935> between the camp <WH4264> of the Egyptians <WH4714> and the camp <WH4264> of Israel <WH3478>; and it was a cloud <WH6051> and darkness <WH2822> to them, but it gave light <WH215> by night <WH3915> to these: so that the one came not near <WH7126> the other <WH2088> all the night <WH3915>.

And Moses <WH4872> stretched out <WH5186> his hand <WH3027> over the sea <WH3220>; and the LORD <WH3068> caused the sea <WH3220> to go <WH3212> back by a strong <WH5794> east <WH6921> wind <WH7307> all that night <WH3915>, and made <WH7760> the sea <WH3220> dry <WH2724> land, and the waters <WH4325> were divided <WH1234>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went <WH935> into the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220> upon the dry <WH3004> ground: and the waters <WH4325> were a wall <WH2346> unto them on their right hand <WH3225>, and on their left <WH8040>.

And the Egyptians <WH4714> pursued <WH7291>, and went in <WH935> after <WH310> them to the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220>, even all Pharaoh's <WH6547> horses <WH5483>, his chariots <WH7393>, and his horsemen <WH6571>.

And it came to pass, that in the morning <WH1242> watch <WH821> the LORD <WH3068> looked <WH8259> unto the host <WH4264> of the Egyptians <WH4714> through the pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> and of the cloud <WH6051>, and troubled <WH2000> the host <WH4264> of the Egyptians <WH4714>,

And took off <WH5493> their chariot <WH4818> wheels <WH212>, that they drave <WH5090> them heavily <WH3517>: so that the Egyptians <WH4714> said <WH559>, Let us flee <WH5127> from the face <WH6440> of Israel <WH3478>; for the LORD <WH3068> fighteth <WH3898> for them against the Egyptians <WH4714>. that they: or, and made them to go heavily

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Stretch out <WH5186> thine hand <WH3027> over the sea <WH3220>, that the waters <WH4325> may come again <WH7725> upon the Egyptians <WH4714>, upon their chariots <WH7393>, and upon their horsemen <WH6571>.

And Moses <WH4872> stretched forth <WH5186> his hand <WH3027> over the sea <WH3220>, and the sea <WH3220> returned <WH7725> to his strength <WH386> when the morning <WH1242> appeared <WH6437>; and the Egyptians <WH4714> fled <WH5127> against <WH7125> it; and the LORD <WH3068> overthrew <WH5287> the Egyptians <WH4714> in the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220>. overthrew: Heb. shook off

And the waters <WH4325> returned <WH7725>, and covered <WH3680> the chariots <WH7393>, and the horsemen <WH6571>, and all the host <WH2428> of Pharaoh <WH6547> that came <WH935> into the sea <WH3220> after <WH310> them; there remained <WH7604> not so much as <WH5704> one <WH259> of them.

But the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> walked <WH1980> upon dry <WH3004> land in the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220>; and the waters <WH4325> were a wall <WH2346> unto them on their right hand <WH3225>, and on their left <WH8040>.

Thus the LORD <WH3068> saved <WH3467> Israel <WH3478> that day <WH3117> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Egyptians <WH4714>; and Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> the Egyptians <WH4714> dead <WH4191> upon the sea <WH3220> shore <WH8193>.

And Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> that great <WH1419> work <WH3027> which the LORD <WH3068> did <WH6213> upon the Egyptians <WH4714>: and the people <WH5971> feared <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068>, and believed <WH539> the LORD <WH3068>, and his servant <WH5650> Moses <WH4872>. work: Heb. hand
